post.author: Admin
post.title: Donations Needed for Pizza Party
post.description: Hello Band Families!Every year after the Fruit Sale Blitz Weekend, we have a pizza party for the ban
post.content:
Hello Band Families!

Every year after the Fruit Sale Blitz Weekend, we have a pizza party for the bandos! We need donations of:

  • Cases of water
  • Packages of paper dinner plates
  • Packages of napkins
  • Your TIME to help us serve the bandos (Sept 12 – 2:20 – 3:15)

If you are interested in donating or serving, please sign up here.

All donations can be dropped off:

  • Date: September 9
  • Time: 4:15p – 4:45p
  • Place: Uniform Room – Room 310

Thank you in advance for your support!!
